study_plan_entry.title: Advanced Course in Combinatorial Geometry & Optimization I

free_text.Content: The topics treated vary each year, according to participants needs and background. After [br/]introductory lectures, the participants present in detail the chosen material.[br/]
free_text.Required prior knowledge: Combinatorial Geometry, Linear Programming, Algorithms & Complexity[br/]
